typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	hubName as string,
	satName as string,
	hashVal as string
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	wildcardPaths:['*']) ~> DataVaultSource
DataVaultSource derive(each(match(name == '$hubName'), regexReplace($hubName, 'ID', 'VID') = sha2(256, byName($hashVal)))) ~> hashKeys
hashKeys sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> HubLoad
